content.content:

Tolkien-related events that took place or are planned to take place in 2025.

content.title: March
content.content: 25 - Tales of the Shire: A "The Lord of the Rings" Game is scheduled to be released.

content.title: May
content.content: 31 - After 12 years in the role, Shaun Gunner steps down as Chair of The Tolkien Society to become its first Chief Executive Officer. He is succeeded as Acting Chair by Daniel Helen.[1]

content.title: June
content.content:
1 - Shaun Gunner is appointed Chief Executive Officer of The Tolkien Society, having previously served over 12 years as Chair.[1]
